abstract = False¶
class wp4.samples.models.DeviationMixin(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

In place of Deviation records on a worksheet, we have a way of tracking them per sample. Also holds the meta question of whether this specific sample was actually taken or not.

Parameters

  • collected (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “Sample taken”

  • notes (django.db.models.TextField) – “Notes” - Deviation record

collected¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

notes¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class Meta[source]¶
abstract = False¶
class wp4.samples.models.WP7Record(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Based on an export from the WP7 Database. A record in this table means a sample exists on file in the Biobank

Parameters

  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – “ID”

  • barcode (django.db.models.CharField) – “Barcode number”

  • content_type_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “content type”

  • object_id (django.db.models.PositiveIntegerField) – “object id”

  • box_number (django.db.models.CharField) – “box number”

  • position_in_box (django.db.models.CharField) – “position in box”

content_type¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

object_id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

content_object¶

Provide a generic many-to-one relation through the content_type and object_id fields.

This class also doubles as an accessor to the related object (similar to ForwardManyToOneDescriptor) by adding itself as a model attribute.

box_number¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

position_in_box¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class wp4.samples.models.Event(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A Sample Event is a timepoint and process where a specific type of biological sample was extracted from a person. This even can validate whether enough biological samples were taken (e.g. a blood sample results in two separate containers; whereas a perfusate sample has only one), and acts as the link between a Worksheet and the various Sample types

Parameters

  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – “ID”

  • record_locked (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “Record Locked” - Locked by the admin team. This can only be reversed by the System Administrator

  • live (livefield.fields.LiveField) – “Record Active”

  • type (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “Sample type”

  • name (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “Sample Process”

  • taken_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “Date and time taken”

Constant for TYPE_CHOICES

TYPE_URINE = 2¶

Constant for TYPE_CHOICES

TYPE_PERFUSATE = 3¶

Constant for TYPE_CHOICES

TYPE_TISSUE = 4¶

Constant for TYPE_CHOICES

TYPE_CHOICES = ((1, 'Blood Samples'), (2, 'Urine Samples'), (3, 'Perfusate Samples'), (4, 'Tissue Samples'))¶

Limit of choices for Event type data

Constant for NAME_CHOICES

NAME_RECIPIENT_BLOOD1 = 8¶

Constant for NAME_CHOICES

NAME_RECIPIENT_BLOOD2 = 9¶

Constant for NAME_CHOICES

NAME_CHOICES = ((1, 'DB1 Donor Blood Sample'), (2, 'DU1 Donor Urine Sample at Withdrawal of Support'), (3, 'DU2 Donor Urine Sample from Catheter Bag'), (4, 'P1 Perfusate solution after 15 mins of HMP'), (5, 'P2 Perfusate solution prior to departure'), (6, 'P3 Perfusate solution at end of machine perfusion'), (7, 'RKT Kidney Biopsy after reperfusion'), (8, 'RB1 Blood sample after anaesthesia '), (9, 'RB2 Blood sample after reperfusion'))¶

Limit of choices for Event name data

type¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

name¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

taken_at¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

clean()[source]¶

If type is…

  • BLOOD - check for two different types of BloodSample

  • URINE - check for one type of UrineSample

  • PERFUSATE - check for one type of PerfusateSample

  • TISSUE - check for two different types of TissueSample

… and that a suitable Event name was chosen, and that taken_at value is not in the future.

Returns

None

get_absolute_url()[source]¶
exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
bloodsample_set¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class wp4.samples.models.BloodSample(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Sample class type for Blood samples.

Also contains a helper (repeated, but direct) link to the Patient this sample was from (mainly to aide reverse sample look ups from Patient)

Parameters

  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – “ID”

  • record_locked (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “Record Locked” - Locked by the admin team. This can only be reversed by the System Administrator

  • live (livefield.fields.LiveField) – “Record Active”

  • barcode (django.db.models.CharField) – “Barcode number”

  • collected (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “Sample taken”

  • notes (django.db.models.TextField) – “Notes” - Deviation record

  • event_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “event” - Link to an event of type Blood

  • blood_type (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “Blood sample type”

  • person_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “Blood sample from”

  • centrifuged_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “Time sample centrifuged”

SAMPLE_SST = 1¶

Constant for SAMPLE_CHOICES

SAMPLE_EDSA = 2¶

Constant for SAMPLE_CHOICES

SAMPLE_CHOICES = ((1, 'Blood Sample SST'), (2, 'Blood Sample EDTA'))¶

Limit of choices for BloodSample blood_type

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

centrifuged_at¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

wp7_location¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the one-to-many relation created by GenericRelation.

In the example:

class Post(Model):
    comments = GenericRelation(Comment)

post.comments is a ReverseGenericManyToOneDescriptor instance.

clean()[source]¶

If sample is marked as collected, confirm taken_at date is present, otherwise that deviation notes have been recorded.

Ensure that centrifuged_at datetime is not in the future, and that it occured after taken_at datetime

Returns

None

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
